cast.overview: A young man and his three younger siblings are plagued by a sinister presence in the sprawling manor in which they live.
cast.title: Marrowbone

details.biography: Charlie Ross Heaton (born February 6, 1994) is an English actor and musician. He first gained recognition for starring as Jonathan Byers in the Netflix science fiction horror series Stranger Things (2016–present). Beginning his career as a musician, Heaton appeared on British television before starring in Stranger Things and feature films like the 2016 indie thriller Shut In; he has since starred in the thriller films Marrowbone (2017) and The New Mutants (2020), among others.
details.name: Charlie Heaton
